title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion
heading: 1. This order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. This order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Central Bank of Ireland) 
(Designation) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) (central bank ireland) (designation) order 2020

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion
heading: 2. The Central Bank of Ireland is designated for the purposes of Section 29
text_raw:
2. The Central Bank of Ireland is designated for the purposes of Section 29 
of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 
13 of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 October, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [421] 3
